actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 95-1536.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 13471 to strengthen the supervisory authority of Federal agencies which regulate depository institutions, to prohibit interlocking management and director relationships between financial institutions, to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act, to restrict conflicts of interest involving officials of financial supervisory agencies, to control the sale of insured financial institutions, to regulate the use of correspondence accounts, to establish a Federal Bank Examination Council, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 13471 (Federal Deposit Insurance Act).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 13471 to strengthen the supervisory authority of Federal agencies which regulate depository institutions, to prohibit interlocking management and director relationships between financial institutions, to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act, to restrict conflicts of interest involving officials of financial supervisory agencies, to control the sale of insured financial institutions, to regulate the use of correspondence accounts, to establish a Federal Bank Examination Council, and for other purposes.
